column2: an A.M. Eatery////Service is fast and friendly. However
column3: I had to subtract one star for the wait and parking. I'd definitely recommend coming here early or be prepared for a long wait. We came as a large party of 8 on an early Friday morning right around opening time
column4: and only waited 20 minutes for a table. However by the time we were leaving
column5: the restaurant was already packed. Parking is abysmal. The Snooze is tiny
column6: so you're left to street park at your own discretion.
